meanings.definition: To shout "hooray" in celebration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The children were hooraying after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: Everyone started hooraying when the news was announced.
meanings.sent3: The hooraying at the party was so loud that the neighbors could hear.
meanings.sent4: The fans hooraying for their team could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent5: She was hooraying with such enthusiasm that her voice became hoarse.

meanings.definition: The act of cheering or expressing joy by shouting "hooray".
meanings.sent1: The hooraying of the crowd filled the stadium.
meanings.sent2: His loud hooraying showed his excitement for the event.
meanings.sent3: The hooraying of the fans echoed through the streets.
meanings.sent4: The sudden hooraying startled the quiet library patrons.
meanings.sent5: The hooraying of the children was music to the teacher's ears.
